summary: Draw an image to the layer.

parameters.name: img
parameters.description: The image to draw to the layer.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The x coordinate where to place the image on the layer.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The y coordinate where to place the image on the layer.

parameters.name: rotation
parameters.description: The angle (in degrees) in which to rotate the image. A value of ```0``` or ```undefined``` will stop the image being rotated at all.

parameters.name: opacity
parameters.description: The opacity at which to draw the image. A value of ```1.0``` draws the image at full opacity, a value of ```0``` would be completely opaque.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
